post.body: At least a .40 S&W. Targets are likely wearing many layers or have thick reindeer hides.
You're lucky. My wife just keeps mine in her slippers for convenience.
So who is #2?
Well, there is the tax advantage...but as you see, that is often overshadowed by the cold toes on warm balls advantage.

Merry Christmas Twitter peeps. Be happy. Be well. Be safe.

Woo-Hoo! Snow Day!
Apple didn't have a booth at this year's New York State teacher-tech conference. They just had a room where they did demos.
What's awkward to me about the Apple pullout is that it makes this year's appearance seem half-assed. They don't often do half-assed.
